about_the_game:
Synchronized Attack, Part 2! This track pack includes six new tracks and eleven soundtrack items.

New tracks!

  • Carnivàle by 2DCAT
  • Fuchsia Is The Future by Jocko Homomorphism
  • Lone Tower, a SEQUENCE STORM original track
  • Ragnarök by RIN
  • Sapphic Casanova by RIN
  • The Funeral by YOUNG JAGUAR

And new soundtrack items!

  • Carnivàle - Short Edit
  • Carnivàle
  • Fuchsia Is The Future - Extended Edit
  • Fuchsia Is The Future
  • Lone Tower - Short Edit
  • Lone Tower
  • Ragnarök
  • Sapphic Casanova - Short Edit
  • Sapphic Casanova
  • The Funeral - Short Edit
  • The Funeral

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics 520

pc_requirements.recommended:
